text: Callas Forever is a 2002 Italian French Spanish British Romanian biographical drama movie directed by Franco Zeffirelli and starring Fanny Ardant, Jeremy Irons, Joan Plowright, Jay Rodan, Gabriel Garko. == Other websites == * Category:2002 drama movies Category:2000s biographical movies Category:Italian biographical movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:French biographical movies Category:French drama movies Category:Spanish biographical movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British drama movies Category:Romanian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Franco Zeffirelli
title: Callas Forever
